definition: surname Luo/old name of several rivers (in Henan, Shaanxi, Sichuan and Anhui)

sentences.english: A very good example of this grape is Summerfield Merlot.
sentences.chinese: 金州夏野梅洛紅是一個非常好的例證。

sentences.english: Among those killed was the top U.N. official in Iraq - Sergio Vieira de Mello.
sentences.chinese: 喪生的人員中包括聯合國駐巴格達最高官員德梅洛。

sentences.english: "We can't find anything wrong with it," Melosh said.
sentences.chinese: “我們找不到這一理論的錯誤之處，”梅洛森說。

sentences.english: Only Caceres, and Mello is because the South American qualifiers will arrive later.
sentences.chinese: 只有卡塞雷斯和梅洛因爲南美區預選賽會稍晚到達。

sentences.english: Reds boss Roy Hodgson is considering Melo as a direct replacement for want-away defensive midfielder Javier Mascherano.
sentences.chinese: 老霍考慮把梅洛作爲想走的後腰小馬的直接替代者。

sentences.english: Kristin Haney and Mello went head to head for the hot seat match.
sentences.chinese: 克里斯汀哈尼和梅洛到頭部，以頭的熱點座位匹配。

sentences.english: When my friend Melot set the trap, I think I knew it.
sentences.chinese: 當我的朋友梅洛特設下圈套，我想我是知道的。

sentences.english: De Mello lowered her Ruger and stroked the girl's face to comfort her.
sentences.chinese: 梅洛垂下魯格步槍，撫摸着女孩的臉，安慰她。

sentences.english: Smoothing as the diving into the sea, this Australian Merlot is a deeper, brilliant red.
sentences.chinese: 這款梅洛葡萄酒口感平滑順口，色澤爲明亮的深紅色。

sentences.english: I attacked with my Meloku the Clouded Mirror.
sentences.chinese: 我用曇鏡梅洛古攻擊了。

sentences.english: Merlot is a popular type of red wine.
sentences.chinese: 梅洛紅葡萄酒是一種普及型。

sentences.english: The nose displays attractive, strong, aromatic cabernet berry fruits with raspberry characters from the Merlot.
sentences.chinese: 帶着吸引人的，強烈的，芬芳的蘇維翁水果和梅洛。

sentences.english: De Mello, one of the newest members of DRAE, was also jubilant.
sentences.chinese: DRAE的新成員梅洛也很高興。

sentences.english: When Mello arrived in Columbia, she felt completely prepared.
sentences.chinese: 梅洛來到哥倫比亞時，她覺得自己完全做好了準備。

sentences.english: Camelot is waiting for the winning ticket holder to come forward and claim unimaginable riches.
sentences.chinese: 卡梅洛特公司仍在等待中獎人前來領取大獎。

sentences.english: People, the city king missing, carmelo, worried.
sentences.chinese: 國王失蹤，卡梅洛特城裏，衆人心急如焚。

definition: Burgundy (Bourgogne), kingdom during medieval period, now region of France
